title: “My Glorious Gateway” - Liv Kennedy
itunes:title: “My Glorious Gateway” - Liv Kennedy
description:
This week brings yet another incredible guest, as the halflings are joined by board game expert & all-around wonderful human being Liv Kennedy as she doles out great board game recommendations, Liv and Jaspers spooky close connection and of course a live reaction to the new Lightyear trailer... You know cause halfling chaos! 

Find the amazing Liv Kennedy here!

Want more 3BH in your life? You can now buy merchandise here! 

Support us on Patreon at patreon.com/tbhalflings for your Shirefolk Shoutout and Bonus Episodes including Campfire Chats where we dive into each episode of Outlaws & Obelisks.

Connect with us on Twitter, Instagram, and Facebook @tbhalflings, on our Discord, or email secondbreakfast@tbhalflings.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
